sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' const PASSWORD_REGEX = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-zA-Z]).{8,}$/ const validationSchema = yup.object({ fullName: yup.string().min(3).max(100).required('Debes colocar tu nombre completo'), email: yup.string().email('Por favor introduce una dirección de email válida').required(), city: yup.string().min(3, 'Por favor introduce la ciudad').max(100, 'Por favor introduce la ciudad').required(), }) const InterestedUserForm = () => { const onSubmit = (values) => { alert(JSON.stringify(values)) } const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { fullName: "", email: "", city: "" }, validateOnBlur: true, onSubmit, validationSchema:{validationSchema} }) return (
) } export default InterestedUserForm
